Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Directs the department of taxation and finance to provide notice to property owners who are veterans when a school district grants a school tax exemption or abatement for veterans
Summary: Directs the department of taxation and finance to provide notice to property owners who are veterans when a school district grants a school tax exemption or abatement for veterans and provide direction on how to apply for such exemption or abatement.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to directing the department of taxation and finance to provide notice to property owners who are veterans when the school district, in which their property is situate, elects to provide a real property exemption or abatement to veterans
